messages.content:
I'm implementing the configurable end-buffer size feature. I'll be modifying the following files:
1. dspy/streaming/messages.py - Adding buffer_watermark field to StreamResponse dataclass (lines 17-18)
2. dspy/streaming/streaming_listener.py - Adding end_buffer_size parameter and related logic (lines 24-155)

I'll be working on these specific line ranges to avoid conflicts. Please let me know if you're working on any of these files or if you have any concerns.

I'm implementing the "Explicitly Mark the End of Streaming" feature. I'll be modifying:
- dspy/streaming/messages.py lines 16-17: Adding is_last_chunk: bool field to StreamResponse dataclass
- dspy/streaming/streaming_listener.py line 169: Modifying return statement to pass is_last_chunk=self.stream_end

I'm taking ownership of these specific line ranges to avoid conflicts with your work on buffer_watermark and end_buffer_size. Please confirm if you're working on any of these lines.

I've completed my implementation of the "Explicitly Mark the End of Streaming" feature. Here's what I've done:

1. Added `is_last_chunk: bool` field to `StreamResponse` dataclass in dspy/streaming/messages.py (lines 16-17)
2. Modified `receive` method in dspy/streaming/streaming_listener.py (line 169) to pass `is_last_chunk=self.stream_end`

I've coordinated with you to avoid merge conflicts by working on non-overlapping line ranges. The implementation is complete and ready for testing. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further clarification.

I've completed my implementation of the configurable end-buffer size feature. I've made the following changes:
1. Added end_buffer_size parameter to StreamListener.__init__ with default value 10
2. Added validation for end_buffer_size (must be integer between 3 and 64) with exact error messages
3. Replaced hardcoded queue size check (10) with self.end_buffer_size
4. Added buffer_watermark field to StreamResponse construction with min(self.field_end_queue.qsize(), self.end_buffer_size) value
5. Updated docstrings to include end_buffer_size parameter description and example usage

I've coordinated with you to avoid conflicts by working on non-overlapping sections of the code. I've completed all my changes to streaming_listener.py and am ready for you to complete your work on the is_last_chunk field.
